tool.name: Atlas import: get experiment data
tool.description: Obtain study data from Single Cell Expression Atlas
tool.command:
get_experiment_data.R --accession-code "${accession_code}" --matrix-type "${matrix_type}" --get-sdrf "${get_sdrf}" --get-condensed-sdrf "${get_condensed_sdrf}" --get-marker-genes "${get_marker_genes}"
#if $config_file --config-file "${config_file}" #end if #if $decorated_rows --decorated-rows "${decorated_rows}" #end if #if $use_default_expr_names --use-default-expr-names "${use_default_expr_names}" #end if #if $exp_data_dir --exp-data-dir "${exp_data_dir}" #end if #if $get_idf --get-idf "${get_idf}" #end if #if $number_of_clusters --number-of-clusters "${number_of_clusters}" #end if #if $use_full_names --use-full-names "${use_full_names}" #end if

param.name: accession_code
param.label: Accession code
param.help: Accession code of dataset to be downloaded

param.name: matrix_type
param.label: Matrix type
param.help: Type of matrix to be imported

param.name: get_sdrf
param.label: Import SDRF file
param.help: Boolean indicating whether SDRF file needs to be imported

param.name: get_idf
param.label: Import IDF file
param.help: Boolean indicating whether IDF file needs to be imported

param.name: get_condensed_sdrf
param.label: Get condensed SDRF file
param.help: Boolean indicating whether condensed SDRF file needs to be imported

param.name: get_marker_genes
param.label: Import marker genes
param.help: Boolean indicating whether marker genes should be imported

param.name: decorated_rows
param.label: Decorated rows
param.help: Boolean indicating whether a decorated version of the rows should be imported

param.name: use_default_expr_names
param.label: Use default expr names
param.help: Should default (non 10x-type) file names be used for expression data? Default: FALSE

param.name: exp_data_dir
param.label: Expression data dir
param.help: Name of the directory with expression data

param.name: number_of_clusters
param.label: Number of clusters
param.help: Number of clusters in marker genes file

param.name: use_full_names
param.label: Use full names
param.help: Should non-expression data files be named with full file names? Default: FALSE
